### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(6.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric pole at position(6.5, 0.5)
- Electric pole at position(13.5, 10.5)
- Electric pole at position(14.5, 9.5)
- Electric pole at position(13.5, 12.5)
- Electric pole at position(10.5, 13.5)
- Electric pole at position(12.5, 13.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(x1)
- Furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill at position(x2)
- Furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill at position(x3)
- Furnace at position(y3)

### Iron plate factory at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0) - Status: EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 12
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0) - Status: EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT, Fuel: 6
- Furnace at position(2.0, 2.0) - Status: EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 20

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5) - Inventory: {'iron-plate': 160}

### Lab at position(6.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(6.0, 0.0) - Status: EntityStatus.NO_POWER, research: automation

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available before attempting to use furnaces or other crafting entities.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to power supply
- Check the power supply to structures like labs and ensure they are connected to an electricity source to avoid power-related errors.
